get.description: returns an object based on the service type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The service type name which is always 'experience'

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: This is used to filter the search based on the keyword. Keyword can be city, country, activity or any word.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: This is used to filter the search based on the category. The category can be fetched from the search section filters endpoint

parameters.name: attribute
parameters.description: This is used to filter the search based on the attribute. The attribute can be fetched from the search section filters endpoint

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: This is used to choose the language of the content. Use value 'ar' for arabic. For english leave it empty
